thread.title: 4G-TV at the IBC 2015: net mobile, Dolby and Geniatech Present the Results of Their Cooperation in IPTV for the First Time
thread.title_full: 4G-TV at the IBC 2015: net mobile, Dolby and Geniatech Present the Results of Their Cooperation in IPTV for the First Time

title: 4G-TV at the IBC 2015: net mobile, Dolby and Geniatech Present the Results of Their Cooperation in IPTV for the First Time
text:
-0.13 
DUSSELDORF, Germany--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
4G – TV’s live demonstration via mobile networks demonstrates entertainment with best sound quality on all devices 
Based on subscriber figures, Western Europe is the biggest market for IPTV services, followed by Asia and North America 1 .Internet Protocol TV, better known as IPTV, is the basis for the TV experience that net mobile AG (net-m) provides customers with best possible quality via its 'Solution as a Service' - also known as Anyscreen - through conventional Internet connections as well as mobile 3G or 4G networks. To this end, net-m, the specialist for video content distribution has teamed up with Dolby Laboratories, one of the world's most successful provider of audio and video technologies as well as Geniatech Inc., a leading manufacturer of Android set top boxes. This collaboration will allow providers and media service operators to benefit from optimised customisation plus use of set-top boxes and a first-class sound experience even via mobile networks. 
The three manufacturers will present the 4G-TV solution in a live demonstration at the IBC in Amsterdam, one of the world's most important trade fair for film, television and radio productions at net-ms stand 14.L16 in Hall 14 and at Geniatech´s stand 5.A41e in Hall 5 at the RAI Conference Center. 
"Media use has changed radically, as it is precisely mobile usage that has grown extremely. Anyscreen allows providers to offer their customers a customisable mix of linear TV, video on demand and catch-up content optimised for each screen. In addition, end users can interact with social networks during the TV viewing experience. The improvement in quality of sound is the next logical step for a user’s perfect overall experience." says Carsten Müller, Senior Vice President of Business to Operator & Media at net mobile AG. 
More than 10 years experience of Streaming 
Thanks to intensive cooperation with mobile operators and media partners around the world the Dusseldorf specialist for the distribution of video content via the Internet has provided its partners with matching white label solutions for more than 10 years. 
About Geniatech Inc. 
Geniatech Inc. is one of the globally leading ODM/OEM Android TV Solution and Platform suppliers. Geniatech`s product and platform services portfolio encloses smart IPTV OTT/STB solution`s and as also smart hybrid OTT/STB solution`s with a full range of digital TV Tuner support. Our ODM/OEM service provide smart OTT / IPTV STB Design`s based on Android and Linux, this portfolio is available on both form factors, as Box, and as such as HDMI Stick. Geniatech Customer`s and Partner`s enjoy our advanced services in customization and development capabilities to support there ECO System at is best with such as: Industry Design, Hardware design, Electrical Design, Android/Linux software design and Middleware Integration, APP/APK Application Design and Development, Middleware / DRM Integration, e.g. Microsoft Playready, Verimatrix, Widewine Level 1/3 trusted video path and Manufacturing Services following international quality standards. 
About Dolby Laboratories 
Dolby Laboratories (NYSE: DLB) creates audio, video, and voice technologies that transform entertainment and communications in mobile devices, at the cinema, at home, and at work. For 50 years, sight and sound experiences have become more vibrant, clear, and powerful in Dolby®. For more information, please visit www.dolby.com . 
About net mobile AG 
net mobile AG is a leading international full-service provider of mobile value added services and payment solutions. The company, founded in November 2000, is regarded as an innovation leader in the marketplace. Clients worldwide include national and global mobile telecommunication providers, media companies, portals, brand name companies as well as TV channels, for which complete white label solutions such as direct carrier billing and mobile TV services are provided. Since December 2009 NTT DOCOMO, INC. is the main shareholder with over 87% share ownership. For more information please visit www.net-mobile.com . 
If you have any further questions, we will be most happy to help. We will gladly establish a direct contact to the responsible person at net mobile AG. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150908005722/en/ Contact
